description: She is a Racan member who is dating both Shinji and Hal. She appears to enjoy her apparent freedom, but when she is with Hal, she seems to be more conscious of Shinji. Is she trying to compensate for the loneliness that she gets from being with Shinji, who does not show any clear interest in her, by spending time with the simple and easy-to-understand Hal?
name: Youko
